Skiing is more closely associated with Colorado than Florida. Colorado is home to some of the best ski resorts in the world, including Vail, Aspen, and Breckenridge. Florida, on the other hand, is known for its sunny beaches and warm weather.

Skiing is more commonly associated with Colorado, as it is home to many of the most popular ski resorts in the United States. Florida, on the other hand, is more associated with beach activities and water sports.
